data.actual_result: a DM from someone is opened instead of a text channel of a server. surprisingly, you are still at a server instead of viewing the DM list
data.expected_result: a text channel should be opened if you are at a server as the overlay starts
data.short_description: DM is opened instead of a text channel of a server when you start the overlay at the first time.
data.steps_to_repro: - have a fresh start of discord client - start a game. - open the game overlay from your keybind. observe carefully.
